price: Or have We given them a Book before this [Qur’an], to which they are holding fast?
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
